name: fixer-cyberpunk-roguelike
description: A hardcore multiplayer cyberpunk roguelike game

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:client && npm run lint:fix:server
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist client/node_modules server/dist server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install

author: Your Name
